name: Wheels On Impossible Ramp
description:
Want to play the funniest crazy simulation game? Then Wheels On Impossible Ramp is one of the best simulation gameplay from Bigcode Free Games. You will experience the extreme fun on impossible ramps with crazy collections of racing wheels. This is a unique simulation gameplay filled with fun & entertainment to all. Get ready to enjoy the extreme racing adventure gameplay.

Have you ever imagined playing a racing game sitting on a wheelchair, a toilet or any other weird wheels on the ramps? However, in this gameplay, you will find all types of extreme weird racing wheels which are highly impossible to imagine yet dangerous to play on ramps like a wheelchair, a dustbin, a stretcher, a toilet, a shopping cart etc & much more freaky collections to enjoy. Wow! So get ready to play the most awaited game to unlock all the unique levels and grab the entire daily bonus. Start collecting all the craziest achievements just for you. Share with your friends & prove them that you are the best player on impossible ramps. Download and play the craziest simulation game of the year.

Hurry up!!! Don't miss the fun.

Wheels On Impossible Ramp Features:
* FREE simulation game to play
* Realistic sound effects
*Extreme Racing Adventure game to play
* Extreme collection of racing wheels on ramps
* Unlock and play with 22+ wheels
* Beautiful animations & HD graphics
* Crazy & unique levels to play
* Unlimited offers & Daily Bonus
